member.name: LSA_LAST_INTER_LOGON_INFO
member.summary: The LSA_LAST_INTER_LOGON_INFO structure contains information about a logon session.

member.name: LSA_LAST_INTER_LOGON_INFO.LastSuccessfulLogon
member.summary: The time that the session owner most recently logged on successfully.

member.name: LSA_LAST_INTER_LOGON_INFO.LastFailedLogon
member.summary: The time of the most recent failed attempt to log on.

member.name: LSA_LAST_INTER_LOGON_INFO.FailedAttemptCountSinceLastSuccessfulLogon
member.summary: The number of failed attempts to log on since the last successful log on.
